body: Please remove this line. `.DS_Store` should be ignored at each Mac users' global gitconfig not at each projects.
Thanks... but it should not be done in a PR.

These codes should be executed only when a dropdown is shown. In addition, `ListView` has a responsibility for managing dropdown's design. So, please move the logic to `ListView#render` method. At the method, you can insert header and footer by modifying a `html` local variable.
`position` object has two bottom properties. It is strange.
There is `$window = $(window);` (defined at L4). Please use it instead :)
In my understanding, `this.$el[0]` is identical to `element`. Do you have any reason to avoid using `element.ownerDocument.activeElement`?
contenteditable object has `this.el`. You can replace `this.$el[0]` with it.
Nope, no reason, I'll change it.  Probably due to a find and replace.  I wrote a lot of this stuff ages ago and once it was working I didn't look back at it :)
There is `var $window = $(window)` in this scope, so please replace `$(window)` with it.
This line may be executed before `DOMContentLoaded`. In that case `$('body')` is empty jQuery object.

I think it should be alright if the line is changed to just 
`appendTo: 'body',`
since that is executed when the component is instantiated. What do you think?
